Tomatoes are the fourth most commonly consumed fresh vegetable and the most frequently consumed canned vegetable in the American diet. There is emerging epidemiology data supporting the connection between increased tomato consumption and reduced risk for both cardiovascular disease and prostate cancer.

Here we will summarize the nutrient and the phytochemical content of tomatoes and tomato products, and how these bioactive components might act together to modulate disease development.

Recent animal studies have investigated tomatoes, lycopene, and prostate cancer using the N-methyl-N-nitrosourea and Dunning rat models.

These animal studies also suggest that diets containing tomatoes may decrease the risk or the progression of prostate cancer. Due to the frequency and the extent of tomato consumption, the supporting epidemiological and animal data, which connect increased intakes with decreased cancer and cardiovascular disease risk, tomato's role in the American diet is of undeniable importance as part of a healthy diet.

This is a warning to all prostate cancer sufferers. I was diagnosed with invasive prostate cancer in 2016. I was given 3 options for the cancer and the best treatment option was given to me. The options were removal, radiotherapy, or brachytherapy, which if chosen would set me back personally around USD 15,000. I decided on the third option as it was made out to be the discovery of the century. We sold off a lot of items to raise the money for the procedure. What a bad decision! I had the procedure, paid my money up front, and since then my life has been ruined by this treatment. First I had to use a catheter for 7 months, 4 times a day, then I went down for a cystoscopy, and contracted a dangerous bug in my bladder that went to my blood stream. The next day I went down, actually died, as my breathing stopped due to collapsed lungs. Lucky my son lives two streets from a hospital, as I was pronounced dead on arrival, as my lungs and heart had stopped from the effects of the bug. Since then I have been hospitalized, with a recurrence of the same bug. And I have just been diagnosed with a wrecked bladder and wrecked urethra, all due to this brachytherapy radiation. So people, be very careful if ever offered that option. They never warned me of the after effects, just the good things. I hope this helps someone, even one person from that awful treatment life was very dangerous and hard for me until i met an old friend of mine in the hospital who told me about DR HARVEY and how he cures different people with various diseases with his natural herbs and roots and i requested for his contact information and contacted him purchased the herbal medicine he gave me instructions on how to administer it and i believed him and followed his instructions after 2 weeks of consumption i went to the hospital the fourth week and carried out a test and behold I'm totally healed and cured I'm forever grateful to DR HARVEY you are a blessing to this world thanks for all you do sir..
You can contact DR HARVEY VIA EMAIL:[Drharveyphytotherapy@yahoo.com]

My name is Stefan. I want to share the good news of how I was cured of non-small cell lung cancer. I was diagnosed with non-small cell lung cancer in April. I did surgery and later went for many rounds of chemotherapy and radiotherapy. Even though I always come out weak after chemotherapy, I had no choice than to continue with the treatments for months because that was my only chance of staying alive and beating the cancer with time. After 3 months of treatments, I realized that I became very weak and could not continue with the chemotherapy and that was when my doctor gave up on my case and told me that I have a period of 2-6 months left to live. I became so down and just wished death would come that day because I had suffered a lot only for my doctor to still give up on me. After a week that the doctor had told me about the bad news, my sister suggested that I don't give up and try some other remedies. So I started eating bitter apricot seed kernels along with Bromelain, and vitamins. So I continued to search for other home remedies on the internet when I came across a post on a health blog where a lady shared her experience and how she had to try some natural herbal medicines from a doctor and after 2 months of using the herbal medicines she got healed. The most recent meta analysis of studies done on soy foods or isoflavone supplements that I've seen found that there was no significant change in testosterone or estrogen levels in men. It was an analysis of over a dozen placebo controller studies. If you have read a controlled study that showed an abnormal amount of estrogen in men I'd like to see that (though I'd also point out that abnormal just means 'out of the norm;, not 'dangerous' or 'excessive').

Not exactly. Soy does contain phytoestrogens and so hypothetically could affect hormonal levels in men, but studies done on it have failed to show any influence on testosterone or estrogen levels in men. The video is actually right, the scientific data shows a reduced prostate cancer risk from Soy ingestion. Obviously everything has to be eaten as part of a balanced diet or else you will end up deficient in something. Soy for now seems safe for men at normal levels, but research goes on!
